text: The fourth season of the mystery music game show Hidden Voices premiered on on HTV7. This spin-off program is officially recognized as a part of I Can See Your Voice franchise. ==Gameplay== ===Format=== Under the versus format, both guest artists can eliminate one mystery singer each in the first two rounds, and then both can choose one mystery singer each to duet-perform with in the third round. The winning condition implies to each mystery singer chosen by guest artist that has been duet-performed separately, if: * One guest artist had chosen a "good singer" and another one had chosen a "bad singer"; or * Both two guest artists had chosen a "good singer" or a "bad singer". ;Rewards The guest artist(s) gets ₫50,000,000 (if one of them was a good singer); or ₫25,000,000 each (if both two were good singers). Both winning mystery singers also get ₫10,000,000 each. ===Rounds=== There are seven individuals of mystery singers standing on the platform with its aliases to keep their identities concealed until stage of truth performance. ;Round 1: Singer's visual The guest artist is given some time to observe and examine each mystery singer based on their appearance. After this, a muted video of each mystery singer that reveals only 0.3 seconds of their singing voice is played as an additional hint. ;Round 2: Singer's lip-sync Each mystery singer performs a lip-sync of a song. Good singers lip-sync to their own voice, while bad singers lip-sync to other's voices. ;Round 3: Singer's verdict The guest artist(s) must have then 30 seconds to interrogate the remaining mystery singers before making the final decision. ==Episodes (2019)== ===Guest artists=== {|class="toccolours" style="font-size:100%; white-space:nowrap;" |Color key: |- | |- | |} {| class="wikitable" style="
